00024 #ifndef _FREQUENCYDATA_HPP_
00025 #define _FREQUENCYDATA_HPP_

00028 #include "SampleDatum.hpp"
00029 #include "CalibrationParameters.hpp"
00030 #include <vector>
00031 #include <complex>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace pwiz {
00035 namespace data {
00036 
00037 
00038 typedef SampleDatum< double, std::complex<double> > FrequencyDatum;
00039 
00040 
00041 /// Class for binary storage of complex frequency data.
00042 
00043 /// Stores raw frequency-domain data, as well as meta-data.  Also includes
00044 /// basic access and analysis functions.
00045 
00046 class FrequencyData
00047 {
00048     public:
00049 
00050     /// \name types
00051     //@{
00052         enum IOMode {Binary, Text, Automatic};
00053         typedef std::vector<FrequencyDatum> container;
00054         typedef container::iterator iterator;
00055         typedef container::const_iterator const_iterator;
00056     //@}
00057 
00058     /// \name instantiation
00059     //@{
00060         FrequencyData();
00061         FrequencyData(const std::string& filename, IOMode mode=Automatic);
00062         FrequencyData(const FrequencyData& that, const_iterator begin, const_iterator end);
00063         FrequencyData(const FrequencyData& that, const_iterator center, int radius);
00064         ~FrequencyData();
00065     //@}
00066 
00067     /// \name I/O
00068     //@{
00069         void read(const std::string& filename, IOMode mode=Automatic);
00070         void read(std::istream& is, IOMode mode=Binary);
00071         void write(const std::string& filename, IOMode mode=Binary) const;
00072         void write(std::ostream& os, IOMode mode=Binary) const;
00073     //@}
00074 
00075     /// \name data access
00076     //@{
00077         /// const access to underlying data
00078         const container& data() const;
00079 
00080         /// non-const access to underlying data -- must call analyze() to recache after any changes
00081         container& data();
00082     //@}
00083 
00084     /// \name metadata
00085     //@{
00086         int scanNumber() const;
00087         void scanNumber(int value);
00088 
00089         double retentionTime() const;
00090         void retentionTime(double value);
00091 
00092         const CalibrationParameters& calibrationParameters() const;
00093         void calibrationParameters(const CalibrationParameters& cp);
00094 
00095         double observationDuration() const;
00096         void observationDuration(double value);
00097 
00098         double noiseFloor() const;
00099         void noiseFloor(double value);
00100     //@}
00101 
00102     /// \name data transformation 
00103     //@{
00104         /// transform all underlying data: (x,y) -> (x+shift,y*scale)
00105         void transform(double shift, std::complex<double> scale); 
00106 
00107         /// return current shift of data (compared to original)
00108         double shift() const;
00109 
00110         /// return current scale of data (compared to original)
00111         std::complex<double> scale() const;
00112 
00113         /// normalize by transform( -max.x, 1/abs(max.y) ) 
00114         void normalize();
00115 
00116         /// addition
00117         void operator+=(const FrequencyData& that);
00118     //@}
00119 
00120     /// \name analysis
00121     //@{
00122         /// recache statistics calculations after any direct data changes via non-const data() 
00123         void analyze();
00124 
00125         /// returns an iterator to FrequencyDatum with highest magnitude
00126         const_iterator max() const;
00127 
00128         double mean() const;
00129         double meanSquare() const;
00130         double sumSquares() const;
00131         double variance() const;
00132 
00133         /// special calculation of noise floor for data with zero holes,
00134         /// e.g. data obtained from RAW file m/z-intensity pairs
00135         double cutoffNoiseFloor() const;
00136 
00137         /// calculation of the observation duration from the data
00138         double observationDurationEstimatedFromData() const;
00139     //@}
00140 
00141     /// \name auxilliary
00142     //@{
00143         /// Finds the FrequencyDatum nearest the desired frequency.
00144         const_iterator findNearest(double frequency) const;
00145     //@}
00146 
00147     /// \name auxilliary functions
00148     //@{
00149         /// Returns a <frequency,magnitude> pair.
00150         static std::pair<double,double> magnitudeSample(const FrequencyDatum& datum);
00151     //@}
00152 
00153     private:
00154     struct Impl;
00155     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00156 
00157     /// Hidden to prevent unintended copying of large amounts of data.
00158     FrequencyData(FrequencyData& that);
00159 
00160     /// Hidden to prevent unintended copying of large amounts of data.
00161     FrequencyData& operator=(FrequencyData& that);
00162 };
00163 
00164 
00165 } // namespace data 
00166 } // namespace pwiz
